title: Update Project Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
description: Due to a change in construction strategy, a new work package needs to be added to the project's Work Breakdown Structure (WBS).

tasks.description: Open the WBS for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the current WBS.

tasks.description: Add a new Level 3 WBS element for 'Modular Skid Installation'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the new element to the structure.

tasks.description: Assign a budget to the new WBS element and link it to the relevant section of the project schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent allocates a budget and associates the WBS element with the corresponding project activities.
